channel.title: Ip Ban
channel.description: How do you Ip Ban people? And do you have to be owner or just an admin..im an admin not a owner....owner is having trouble with a spammer

item.title: Ip Ban
item.dc:creator: @slowdown slowdown
item.description:
@slowdown wrote:

[quote=“Devon, post:2, topic:44635”]Well if you host the server look into the source. Find the troublesome member and look at “character-lastconnection =” in his character file in… the character folder

Copy his IP address from “character-lastconnection =” & put it into the bannedips.txt file inside the data folder[/quote]
Really? Because, you think i would have tried it before? I did, and it did’nt work? Don’t give advice that isin’t true…

Read full topic

item.title: Ip Ban
item.dc:creator: @curse63 curse63
item.description:
@curse63 wrote:

[quote=“Devon, post:2, topic:44635”]Well if you host the server look into the source. Find the troublesome member and look at “character-lastconnection =” in his character file in… the character folder

Copy his IP address from “character-lastconnection =” & put it into the bannedips.txt file inside the data folder

Yep,do that.Oh and some clients have this ::IPban persons name here.[/quote]

Read full topic
